item.title: Imperial College Water Polo Make History For Both
item.author: Ramon Fernandez,
item.description: A couple of weeks ago, the water polo boys hopped on the ‘banter’ bus and headed to Bristol’s pool. It not only has a reputation for being very yellow, but also for being the field of battle for a water polo team that has always ranked in the top 5 in the UK. In fact, Imperial’s Men’s team had never …
